sentences.sContent: Administrative staff may be deskilled through increased automation and efficiency.
sentences.sCn: 随着自动化程度和效率提高，行政人员可能不再需要专业技能。

remMethod.val: de(没有)+ skill(技能) → 使非技能化

trans.tranOther: If workers are deskilled, they no longer need special skills to do their work, especially because of modern methods of production
